title: DETOX FLOWER POWER 250ML
description: What can I tell you about spinach that you and Popeye don't know? cleaned_text: What can I tell you about spinach that you and Popeye don't know? Well, although they don't have as much iron as we thought, but they do have a lot of vitamins and minerals that you only absorb if you chew them well, or if you drink them in shakes. And ginger and celery, purifying and anti-inflammatory... and to that add the apples, which the British say that they keep the doctor away ;-) An apple a day keeps the doctor away... Imagine two! ____________________________________________________________________________________________ INGREDIENTS: 2 fresh apples liquefied in a vacuum be) Celery (beware of And some lime wedges Nuestros clientes hablan por nosotros: I did the intermittent fasting challenge with the "Tres días de ayuno intermitente", a great way of getting into it! Didn't feel hungry at all and was full of energy. Fantastico el jengibre. Pica un poco pero a mi me encanta. Sólo para heavy users. [
